title: Randy Barnett & Evan Bernick: The Original Meaning of the Fourteenth Amendment
description:
The post-Civil War change to the Constitution is the topic of law professors Randy Barnett and Evan Bernick's book, "The Original Meaning of the Fourteenth Amendment." They're interviewed by Yale Law professor John Witt. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
